title: 求助啊，整合包一进地图就没显示的推出
author: 柒浪
txt_content:
[16:30:06] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[16:30:07] [UpdateChecker/WARN] Failed to get update url.
java.net.UnknownHostException: huangyuhui.duapp.com

    at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)

    at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)

    at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)

    at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)

    at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.utils.NetUtils.doGet(NetUtils.java:67)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.utils.NetUtils.doGet(NetUtils.java:71)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.utils.UpdateChecker.run(UpdateChecker.java:50)

[16:30:07] [main/INFO] Prepared background image in bgskin folder.
是在哪里有毛病啊

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 EmptyLava 于 2020-2-17 16:44 编辑 

更换启动器或将你的HMCL更新至最新版本
hellominecraft(HMCL)在检查更新时无法解析域名
建议使用pcl
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mobile=1&mod=viewthread&tid=719579
或更新HMCL
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mobile=14&mod=viewthread&tid=142335
